verbs.description: [ARG0: German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [V: said] [ARG1: the U.S. runs a trade surplus with Europe when services are included , marshaling a rebuff to President Donald Trump ’s sustained criticism of German exports] .

German Chancellor Angela Merkel said [ARG0: the U.S.] [V: runs] [ARG1: a trade surplus with Europe] [ARGM-TMP: when services are included] , [ARGM-ADV: marshaling a rebuff to President Donald Trump ’s sustained criticism of German exports] .

German Chancellor Angela Merkel said the U.S. runs a trade surplus with Europe when services [V: are] included , marshaling a rebuff to President Donald Trump ’s sustained criticism of German exports .
